title: Practical Entrepreneurship Experiential Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Business/Economic Knowledge and Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: A customized entrepreneurship education program for adult learners over 40, combining theoretical learning and field experiences to develop competencies applicable to daily life.

learning_goals: Learners can explain legal procedures and funding strategies required for entrepreneurship
Learners can conduct feasibility analyses for business ventures using real market data
Learners can refine entrepreneurial ideas and create pitching materials through team-based projects
Learners successfully complete crisis management and decision-making simulations in experiential learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
